::: The underground cavern they have chosen is large, yet cold, wet, and 
damp. The ice on the cieling form little iceicles and the water in the cave 
is frozen solid. Megatron set his command center far back into the cave, in 
one of its larger caverens. Ra and Waspinator monitor the computers, and 
Megatron finishes assembling his command chair, which he feels he possibly 
could not lead and properly command, with out it. :::

::: Megatron ::: Soon, very soon we wil be the victors in this war. As soon 
as the Maximal base is destroyed, we will sweep in and take command of the 
situation, seeing as how Hell Beast was a coward and retreated.

::: Waspinator ::: What about the Allience?

::: Ra ::: Yes, they have been far to quiet recently.

::: Megatron ::: Zardus is a wise leader. He wouldnt get mixed up in this 
disput that has raged on for generations.

::: Ra ::: Or he could be waiting to strike us all down. Once the Maximals 
are gone, that will leave the Predacons, Newcomers, and Allience at the top 
of the food chain. Now that the NEwcomers and Predacons are working 
together....they might come after us next.

::: Megatron ::: Doubtful. Besides, they wouldnt kill us. They would force us 
into there little peace treaty. As for the Allience, I find it very unclear 
what they in tend to do. One thing is for sure, once the Maximals are gone 
they will need to reveal just what there intentions are. Are they with us? 
Are they agianst us? Or, are they going to let us go about our business 
uninterrupted, yes.

::: Waspinator ::: Waspinator thinks things are going to be alot more 
interesting around here.

::: Megatron laughs ::: Oh yes. Im hoping on it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

::: Hell Beast looks to Gremlin and Jackle standing guard on the monitor. 
Pheniox and Black Aracnia completely cleared out the lab, and the Stasis pod 
was being taken apart peice by peice. :::

::: Transanulas sat on computer duty ::: Hell Beast, it seems the Predacons 
are doing quite well in the battle.

::: Hell Beast, in the command chair ::: And what of the other fractions?

::: Transanulas ::: The Allience has sent a transmission saying they will 
help the Maximals. And Megatron and his group are quiet.

::: Hell Beast ::: I see. Well, if the Allience wants to get involved, they 
have alot to get involved with. Zardus is a good leader who wouldnt jepordise 
his group for a dispute like this unless he felt it was nessecery.

::: Transanulas ::: So, we wont attack them?

::: Hell Beast ::: Not unless it is completely unavoid able, no. I respect 
Zardus.

::: Scourge, from behinde them drinking something, ::: Well, if I was in 
command, I think I would attack there base now.

::: Hell Beasr frowned in disgust ::: Fool. That would cause this to be a...a 
World War. Every fraction fighting for dominence. It would be completely 
ignorant.

::: Scourge frowned and sipped his drink. :::
